name: HUNT (thegambit)
description:
A MINIMAL ACTION ARCADE GAME

Casual mobile game (apk file) - very challenging.

Touch below the character on your mobile screen and drag the ball. Avoid the red objects or your character will explode and the game will be over.

Highly Addictive

Easy to learn and difficult to put down.

Endless twists and turns

****FREE VERSION****
